definition.name: Inferno Emberlash
specialInfo: §8§oCarrying elemental power of permafire, hits has a chance of inflict Bleeding to enemies based on your §6Meele Critical Chance§8§o for 5 seconds. If a enemy that is still bleeding is hit, you suddenly cauterizes its torns, stopping the bleeding and causing a burst of damage based on enemie's §2Max Health§8§o. (You also recieve additional Attack Speed while attacking those enemies)
